html:
Name*

An arbitrary name to identify the current instance in the logs.

Directory*

The path to the directory where changes are monitored. i.e., the path to the /conf directory of the current Creatio instance that includes the _MetaInfo.json file.

FileFilter

A pattern that filters files whose changes to monitor. Not required if you specify the DefaultFileFilter setting for the instance.

ContentWorkerArguments*

Key-value collection of parameters to pass to the ContentService when changes are detected. Key is an object that has the ContentPath parameter. Value is the path to the /conf/content directory.
